Articles.Content: Im working on a series of Rocket showcases now that I got time and I want some feedback on my video and What I can do to improve them, Please dont be too harsh.

I guess your using the Isa mapper without a crew? I didn't realise that'd work Oo

As to suggestions, maybe showing how you got your satellite into orbit? Other then that its ok..
Like I said, Cant record launches unless ya want still images, My computer lags way to much. Tomorrows Showcase/ Revies is the Plooto I Cargo, Crew variant.
